author: Jean P. May, Jr.
releaseNotes:
v0.2.10 - correct a debug line without a qualifier
v0.2.9 - convert \n to newline for write and append files
v0.2.8 - appendFile to create file if it doesn't exist
v0.2.7 - add lastFileWritten and lastFileWrittenTimeStamp
v0.2.6 - fix typo in deleteFile method
v0.2.5 - instantiate the exist attribute
v0.2.4 - add file delete command
v0.2.3 - add read and write for image files
v0.2.2 - correct issue with extended character sets
v0.2.1 - allow hub w/security to be external file source
v0.2.0 - add app callback option
v0.1.1 - hub security bug
v0.1.0 - added temporary fileContent attribute, fileList attribute, fileTrimTop and copyFile commands
